Method Summary
static java.util.Collection getAuthorities(java.util.Collection users, java.util.Collection roles, java.util.Collection groups)

Returns user authorities using "USER_" prefix for username, "ROLE_" prefix for user roles, "GROUP_" prefix for user groups
static java.util.Collection getGroupAuthorities(java.util.Collection groups)

Create group authorities from group names by adding "GROUP_" prefix.
static java.lang.String getGroupAuthority(java.lang.String group)

Create group authority from group name by adding "GROUP_" prefix.
static java.util.Collection getGroups(java.util.Collection authorities)

Extracts groups names from list of authorities where group items start with "GROUP_" prefix.

static java.util.Collection getRoleAuthorities(java.util.Collection roles)

Create role authorities from role names by adding "ROLE_" prefix.
static java.lang.String getRoleAuthority(java.lang.String role)

Create role authority from role name by adding "ROLE_" prefix.
static java.util.Collection getRoles(java.util.Collection authorities)

Extracts roles names from list of authorities where roles items start "ROLE_" prefix.

static java.util.Collection getUserAuthorities(java.util.Collection usernames)

Create user authorities from user names by adding "USER_" prefix.
static java.lang.String getUserAuthority(java.lang.String username)

Create user authority from username by adding "USER_" prefix.
static java.util.Collection getUsers(java.util.Collection authorities)

Extracts user names from list of authorities where user items start with "USER_" prefix.

getAuthorities

static java.util.Collection getAuthorities(java.util.Collection users, java.util.Collection roles, java.util.Collection groups)
Returns user authorities using "USER_" prefix for username, "ROLE_" prefix for user roles, "GROUP_" prefix for user groups

getGroupAuthorities

static java.util.Collection getGroupAuthorities(java.util.Collection groups)
Create group authorities from group names by adding "GROUP_" prefix.

getGroupAuthority

static java.lang.String getGroupAuthority(java.lang.String group)
Create group authority from group name by adding "GROUP_" prefix.

getGroups

static java.util.Collection getGroups(java.util.Collection authorities)
Extracts groups names from list of authorities where group items start with "GROUP_" prefix. "GROUP_" prefix is skipped for returning items.

getRoleAuthorities

static java.util.Collection getRoleAuthorities(java.util.Collection roles)
Create role authorities from role names by adding "ROLE_" prefix.

getRoleAuthority

Create role authority from role name by adding "ROLE_" prefix.

getRoles

static java.util.Collection getRoles(java.util.Collection authorities)
Extracts roles names from list of authorities where roles items start "ROLE_" prefix. "ROLE_" prefix is skipped for returning items.

getUserAuthorities

static java.util.Collection getUserAuthorities(java.util.Collection usernames)
Create user authorities from user names by adding "USER_" prefix.

getUserAuthority

static java.lang.String getUserAuthority(java.lang.String username)
Create user authority from username by adding "USER_" prefix.

getUsers

static java.util.Collection getUsers(java.util.Collection authorities)
Extracts user names from list of authorities where user items start with "USER_" prefix. "USER_" prefix is skipped for returning items.
